Body: As others have pointed out in the comments section, the line breaks can occur at any position. This does lead to ambiguity and style issues. If you were to create a MS Word document (in Korean), you will notice its aversion to line break in the middle of a word. I do not remember seeing these kinds of line breaks recently (say, last 2 ~ 3 years). I would imagine I would encounter these more had I been living in Korea and read paper version of daily newspapers.
